version_description:
Added a Diet Diary to the app !!!! 
Weight chart contains 1 month view

Added a Diet Diary to the app !!!! 
Weight chart contains 1 month view

New Awesome design
Bugs of double hair on main screen was fixed

New Awesome design
Bugs of double hair on main screen was fixed

Few errors fixed
FAQs for diary

Few errors fixed
FAQs for diary

* New - In-app diary - Track meals, exercises and water consumption in one screen
* FAQs for diary
* Some minor errors fixed

* New - In-app diary - Track meals, exercises and water consumption in one screen
* FAQs for diary
* Some minor errors fixed

> Support for iOS 8
> Support for 64 bits (iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus)

> Support for iOS 8
> Support for 64 bits (iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus)

Some tips changed
Few glitches fixed

Some tips changed
Few glitches fixed

1. Water glasses copied to other days glitch fixed
2. Better interface for Apple Watch app, voice support for foods search.
3. Some minor usability issues and glitches fixed
4. Drink water notification can add a water glass to your daily summary (iOS 8.2 and above)
5. More fashion items

1. Water glasses copied to other days glitch fixed
2. Better interface for Apple Watch app, voice support for foods search.
3. Some minor usability issues and glitches fixed
4. Drink water notification can add a water glass to your daily summary (iOS 8.2 and above)
5. More fashion items

> Readiness for iOS 8.4
> Minor usability issues fixed

> Readiness for iOS 8.4
> Minor usability issues fixed

> Sync your iPad with your iPhone (iOS 8 and above)
> Few usability changes

> Sync your iPad with your iPhone (iOS 8 and above)
> Few usability changes
Weight chart and measurements glitch fixed
Weight chart and measurements glitch fixed
> Few glitches fixed
> Few glitches fixed

Daily challenges program-  By starting with small changes and taking it a step at a time, you can create healthy weight-loss habits that last a lifetime
Recipes calorie Calculator - Calculate calories per serving of your favorite recipes, then easily log it into your diary
Major changes in app's navigation: Photos, tips and quotes are now located in one screen "Motivation"
Settings and charts can be accessed from the scrolling tab-bar
Several offers for Premium subscriptions
App is working now faster and more smoothly

Integration with FitBit

Enjoy new types of charts (Daily consumed calories, steps, water consumption).

Free sync with Fitbit®
Enjoy new types of charts (Daily consumed calories, steps, water consumption).
Daily challenges program- By starting with small changes and taking it a step at a time, you can create healthy weight-loss habits that last a lifetime
Few glitches fixed and usability issues fixed

Free sync with Fitbit ® (Steps, activities and calories burned)
Add foods, exercises, and weight fast from the home screen
“Me” screen for all your personal data and preferences
Gray hair for your Avatar
Points notifications appear on the bottom of the screen
Easier to track, add and edit weights and measurements
Water tracker charts
